headline: What to expect in Private Equity in 2022
description: Private market liquidity will remain high with private investors who have been sitting on capital during COVID making efforts to put their unspent capital to work.

author.name: Moonfare
author.description: Moonfare is a technology platform that enables individuals and their advisors to invest in top-tier private equity funds, with minimum investments starting at €50,000.
